synopsis.text:
Most ly set in the corporate world, "Kariage-kun" follows the humorous exploits of its titular character, an employee at Honnyara Industries. From broadcasting his personal medical issues in a public park to orchestrating a lackluster fireworks display, Kariage-kun's antics are a source of both amusement and embarrassment for his colleagues and the community. His favorite target for his sarcastic wit and ironic pranks is his department head, but no one is truly safe from his playful teasing.

Adapted from Ueda Masashi's yonkoma manga of the same name, "Kariage-kun" presents a series of chronological vignettes that capture the changing seasons and the everyday absurdity of modern Japanese life. Despite its seemingly mundane setting, the anime offers a unique blend of humor and social commentary that is sure to entertain and enlighten viewers. With no clear beginning or end, each episode stands alone as a testament to Kariage-kun's unpredictable and often hilarious antics.
